aiPrompts.analyzeProfile: Please comprehensively analyze my profile background and evaluate my application competitiveness. Include: 1) Overall score 2) Strengths analysis 3) Weaknesses analysis 4) Improvement suggestions 5) Recommended activities 6) Projected improvement
aiPrompts.recommendSchools: Based on my background, please recommend schools for me, categorized into Reach, Target, and Safety tiers, 2-3 schools each. Please use a clear list format.

prediction.title: Admission Prediction
prediction.subtitle: Overall Score
prediction.content: Based on your profile analysis, your admission chances at target schools are above average. Your test scores are excellent and activities are diverse, but you could strengthen your academic research experience.

strengths.title: Strengths & Weaknesses
strengths.label: Strengths
strengths.item1: Excellent test scores, above target school averages

improvements.title: Improvement Suggestions
improvements.item1: Join academic research programs, publish papers or attend conferences
improvements.item2: Deepen impact of existing activities, aim for higher-level awards

activities.title: Recommended Activities
activities.item2: Apply for internships to gain practical experience

profileComplete.title: Profile Complete!
profileComplete.message: Awesome! Your profile is complete. AI can now recommend better schools for you.

firstPrediction.title: First Prediction!
firstPrediction.message: Congrats on your first admission prediction! Keep exploring more target schools.

firstEssay.title: Essay Started!
firstEssay.message: Your first essay is created! Keep polishing it to impress admission officers.

schoolAdded.title: Target Set!
schoolAdded.message: New target school added! One step closer to your dream.

streak.title: Streak!
streak.message: Keep up the momentum! Consistency is key!

levelUp.title: Level Up!
levelUp.message: Your effort is paying off. Keep going!

achievement.title: Achievement Unlocked!
achievement.message: You unlocked a new achievement! Keep exploring more.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Please read the following terms of service carefully. By using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using the Study Abroad Platform, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Service Description
services.content: We provide information services related to study abroad applications, including but not limited to school recommendations, admission predictions, and case sharing.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.content: Users agree not to upload false information, infringe on others' rights, or engage in any illegal activities.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on the platform (including but not limited to text, images, code) is protected by intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: We strive to ensure accuracy of information, but make no guarantees about prediction results or recommendations. Final application decisions should be made at the user's own discretion.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate user accounts for violations of these terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, please contact us

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We collect the following types of information to provide better services:

items.academic: Academic background information (GPA, test scores, etc.)
items.device: Device information (browser type, IP address, etc.)

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.content: We use collected information for the following purposes:

items.service: To provide and improve our services
items.analytics: To analyze and improve platform performance

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share it only in the following cases:

items.legal: When required by law or to comply with legal process
items.partners: With service providers (bound by confidentiality agreements)

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encrypted transmission, secure storage, and access controls.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your data:

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or platform notification.

contact.title: Privacy Inquiries
contact.content: If you have any privacy-related questions, please contact us

about.title: Study Abroad Platform
about.subtitle: Making every study abroad dream come true

story.title: Our Story
story.content: The Study Abroad Platform was born from the pursuit of educational equity by a group of entrepreneurs who studied abroad. We understand the challenges of information asymmetry in the application process, so we are committed to providing professional, transparent, and efficient services through technology.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We aspire to become the world's most trusted study abroad service platform, using AI technology and real data to help every applicant make the best choice for themselves.

mission.title: Mission-Driven
mission.desc: Helping students achieve their study abroad dreams is our core mission

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.desc: Constantly improving user experience with the latest technology

trust.title: Integrity & Transparency
trust.desc: Real data, objective analysis, no exaggeration or misleading

care.title: Dedicated Service
care.desc: Every user deserves the best service

ai.title: AI Upgrade
ai.desc: Introduced GPT-4, significantly improved prediction accuracy

expansion.title: Global Expansion
expansion.desc: Service expanded to major study abroad destinations worldwide

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: Have any questions or suggestions? We welcome your messages anytime

security.title: Account Security

security.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.description: Find the help and support you need
helpCenter.faqDescription: Browse frequently asked questions for answers

howToStart.question: How do I get started?
howToStart.answer: After registering, complete your profile, then you can start using all features.

whatCanAIDo.question: What can AI do for me?
whatCanAIDo.answer: AI can help with school recommendations, admission predictions, essay polishing, etc.

predictionAccuracy.question: How accurate are the predictions?
predictionAccuracy.answer: Based on large amounts of real case data, our prediction accuracy is over 95%.

dataPrivacy.question: Is my data secure?
dataPrivacy.answer: We use end-to-end encryption to protect your data and never share with third parties.

deleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: You can delete your account in the Account Actions section of Settings.

shareCase.question: How do I share an application case?
shareCase.answer: Click the Share Case button on the Case Library page and fill in the information.

exportData.question: How do I export my data?
exportData.answer: Click the Export Data button on your Profile page.

verifiedUser.question: How do I become a verified user?
verifiedUser.answer: Complete the identity verification process to get a verified badge.
